name: 警官Ａ
message: "Hey, scumbags! What are you doing there?!"
Suddenly, a group of policemen bursts into the alley. They must have been patrolling the area.

name: 警官Ｂ
message: "Freeze or we'll shoot!"
They aim their guns at us.

name: 紅雀
message: "Shit."

name: ウイルス
message: "Oh my, they're wound awfully tight today."

name: トリップ
message: "I think that's our cue to bounce."

name: ウイルス
message: "Yes, this presents a bit of a sticky situation for us as well. Aoba? I suggest running."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Got it."

name: トリップ
message: "We'll break through and then split up. On my signal."

name: トリップ
message: "One, two... three!"
At Trip's signal, we all start running.

name: 警官Ａ
message: "Shoot 'em!"
The officers unleash a hail of rubber bullets. Fortunately, they've been neglecting their training. Not one shot even grazes us.

name: ウイルス
message: "Take―"

name: トリップ
message: "―this!"

name: 警官Ｂ
message: "Woah?!"
Virus and Trip barrel into them, and the officers topple like dominos.

name: ウイルス
message: "See you later, Aoba!"

name: トリップ
message: "Bye-bye!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's go!"

name: 警官Ａ
message: "S-Stop right there, scumbags!"
Virus and Trip broke right, so Koujaku and I dash left.
We hear gunshots and shouting behind us for a while, but by the time we get out of Yukisagi and onto Aoyagi Street, the sounds have disappeared.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haa... Haah, haa."

name: 紅雀
message: "Haa... Man. What a disaster."
You can say that again.
I close my eyes as I try to catch my breath. The scene in the alley rises from the darkness.
Dry Juice tags painted over in black. Bloodstains on the ground.
Where did Mizuki and his gang go? Is he okay?
Who did this?
...Was it really Morphine?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What the hell is going on?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba..."
My rage grows hotter with every passing moment.
Nothing could justify something like this.
This isn't how we do things.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm gonna find whoever did this. No matter what."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. I'll ask my gang if they've seen anything."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks."
I dunno if it's Morphine, but someone did this.
I'll find them, and if Mizuki and the others are hurt...<K> then they're gonna pay.
